subject: Re: [junit] Creating JUnit class using WSAD, Help Required !!!!!
msgSnippet: ¦b ¤@, 2004-08-02 18:13, junit_user2004 ¼g¹D¡G ... The WSAD is IBM enhanced version of eclipse. It bundles with JUnit plug in with it. You can use
messageBody:
在 一, 2004-08-02 18:13, junit_user2004 寫道：
> Hi All,
>
> Currently am using WSAD for developing my application and need your
> help to set up JUnit using the IBM IDE called as WSAD.
> can anyone help me in this regard.
> Regds,
> Dipta Keshari

The WSAD is IBM enhanced version of eclipse. It bundles
with JUnit plug in with it. You can use new->Java->JUnit TestCase
to create new TestCase, and run as JUnit test to run it.
The relationship between WSAD and eclipse is:
WSAD 5.0 --> eclipse 2.0
WSAD 5.1 --> eclipse 2.1

--
If something is ugly or hard, it is wrong.
Steve Chuang
